IntersectionUtil Class Reference
[Mathematical support classes]

#include <IntersectionUtil.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

IntersectionUtil testing utility functions.


Static Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

static bool IntersectionUtil::findLineBoxIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float4x4 &  box,
const float3 &  dimMin,
const float3 &  dimMax,
float *  t,
float3 *  normal = 0 
) [static]

Computes line segment intersection against oriented bounding box if any.

If line start point is inside then intersection is returned at t=0 and normal is set to zero.

Parameters:
orig Line segment origin.
delta Line segment direction and length.
box Box center transformation.
dimMin Box axis lengths in negative directions.
dimMax Box axis lengths in positive directions.
t [out] Receives relative length [0,1] of intersection along line segment.
normal [out] Receives intersection point normal if intersection.
Returns:
true if intersection.

static bool IntersectionUtil::findLineBoxIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float4x4 &  box,
const float3 &  dim,
float *  t,
float3 *  normal = 0 
) [static]

Computes line segment intersection against oriented bounding box if any.

If line start point is inside then intersection is returned at t=0 and normal is set to zero.

Parameters:
orig Line segment origin.
delta Line segment direction and length.
box Box center transformation.
dim Box axis lengths.
t [out] Receives relative length [0,1] of intersection along line segment.
normal [out] Receives intersection point normal if intersection.
Returns:
true if intersection.

static bool IntersectionUtil::findLineCylinderIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float3 &  center,
const float3 &  axis,
float  radius,
float  halfHeight,
float *  t,
float3 *  normal 
) [static]

Finds line cylinder intersection if any.

Parameters:
orig Line start.
delta Vector from line start to end.
center Cylinder center point.
axis Cylinder axis.
radius Cylinder radius.
halfHeight Half cylinder height (+-length from center point along axis).
t [out] Receives length along line to the first intersection if any. Receives 0 if line origin is inside cylinder.
normal [out] Receives intersection plane normal if any and if ptr not 0.
Returns:
true if intersection, false otherwise.

static bool IntersectionUtil::findLinePlaneIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float4 &  plane,
float *  t 
) [static]

Finds line plane intersection if any.

Parameters:
orig Line start.
delta Vector from line start to end.
plane Plane equation. (n.x, n.y, n.z, -p0.dot(n))
t [out] Receives length along line to intersection if any.
Returns:
true if intersection, false otherwise.

static bool IntersectionUtil::findLineSphereIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float3 &  center,
float  radius,
float *  t 
) [static]

Finds line sphere intersection if any.

Parameters:
orig Line origin.
delta Vector from line start to end.
center Sphere center point.
radius Sphere radius.
t [out] Receives length along line to the first intersection if any. Receives 0 if line origin is inside sphere.
Returns:
true if intersection, false otherwise.

static bool IntersectionUtil::findLineTriangleIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float3 &  vert0,
const float3 &  vert1,
const float3 &  vert2,
float *  t 
) [static]

Finds line triangle intersection if any.

Assumes clockwise vertex order. Uses Tomas Moller's algorithm.

Parameters:
orig Line origin.
delta Line delta, vector from start to end.
vert0 The first vertex of the triangle.
vert1 The second vertex of the triangle.
vert2 The third vertex of the triangle.
t [out] Receives length along ray to the intersection if any.
Returns:
true if intersection, false otherwise.

static bool IntersectionUtil::findRayCubicBezierPatchIntersection ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  dir,
const float3  patch[4][4],
int  subdiv,
float *  t,
float *  u,
float *  v 
) [static]

Finds ray Bezier patch intersection if any.

Uses constant subdivision.

Parameters:
orig Ray origin.
dir Ray direction.
patch Cubic Bezier patch control points.
err Error limit. Maximum control polygon vertex distance from a plane.
subdiv Subdivision level. For example subdiv=5 results in 5*5*2 tested triangles.
t [out] Receives length along ray to the intersection if any.
u [out] Receives patch u-coordinate of the intersection if any.
v [out] Receives patch v-coordinate of the intersection if any.

const float3 &  dir,
const float3 &  center,
const float3 &  axis,
float  radius,
float  halfHeight,

center Cylinder center point.

radius Cylinder radius.
halfHeight Half cylinder height (+-length from center point along axis).
t [out] Receives length along ray to the first intersection if any. Receives 0 if ray origin is inside cylinder.
normal [out] Receives intersection plane normal if any and if ptr not 0.
Returns:
true if intersection, false otherwise.

const float3 &  dir,
const float3 &  vert0,
const float3 &  vert1,
const float3 &  vert2,
float *  t 
) [static]

Finds ray triangle intersection if any.

Assumes clockwise vertex order. Uses Tomas Moller's algorithm.

Parameters:
orig Ray origin.
dir Ray direction.
vert0 The first vertex of the triangle.
vert1 The second vertex of the triangle.
vert2 The third vertex of the triangle.
t [out] Receives length along ray to the intersection if any.
Returns:
true if intersection, false otherwise.

static bool IntersectionUtil::testBoxBox ( const float3 &  dim,
const float4x4 &  otherTm,
const float3 &  otherDim 
) [static]

Tests if two oriented boxes overlap.

Uses Stefan Gottchalk's separating axis algorithm.

Parameters:
dim Dimensions of the first OBB.
otherTm Transformation of the second OBB in the first OBB space.
otherDim Dimensions of the second OBB.
Returns:
true if the OBBs overlap, false otherwise.

static bool IntersectionUtil::testLineBox ( const float3 &  orig,
const float3 &  delta,
const float4x4 &  box,
const float3 &  dim 
) [static]

Tests line segment against oriented bounding box.

Parameters:
orig Line segment origin.
delta Line segment direction and length.
box Box center transformation.
dim Box axis lengths.
Returns:
true if intersection.

static bool IntersectionUtil::testPointBox ( const float3 &  point,
const float4x4 &  box,
const float3 &  dimMin,
const float3 &  dimMax 
) [static]

Tests if point is inside oriented bounding box.

Parameters:
point Point position.
box Box center transformation.
dimMin Box axis lengths in negative directions.
dimMax Box axis lengths in positive directions.
Returns:
true if point is inside.

) [static]

float  height1,
float  radius1,
const float3 &  bot2,
float  height2,
float  radius2 
) [static]

Tests if two vertical cylinders overlap.

Parameters:
bot1 bottom vertex of first cylinder
height1 height of first cylinder
radius1 radius of first cylinder
bot2 bottom vertex of second cylinder
height2 height of second cylinder
radius2 radius of second cylinder
